snippet.title: Ghost Recon Breakpoint: Red Patriot Teaser |The Return of the Bodarks
snippet.description:
The new Episode 3 will be available on 15th September, including the RED PATRIOT adventure! 

A threat hovers over Auroa... You'll have to face one of the Ghost’s biggest threats: Raven’s Rock, a Russian separatist group, and their agents, the Bodarks. 

Ghost, get ready to fight against your worst enemies! 

Get more information on Raven's Rock and the Bodarks here: 
https://ghostrecon.fandom.com/wiki/Raven%27s_Rock

Buy Ghost Recon Breakpoint now:
https://ubi.li/4ZGQx

Play as a Ghost, an Elite US Special Operations Unit stranded behind enemy lines. Lost in Auroa, fight to survive against the Wolves.
https://ghostrecon.com
